verses.verse: Doth not <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H7121>cry<s%>, And <S%H8394>understanding<s%> put <S%H5414>forth<s%> her <S%H6963>voice<s%>?
On the <S%H7218>top<s%> of high <S%H4791>places<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>, Where the <S%H5410>paths<s%> <S%H1004>meet<s%>, she <S%H5324>standeth<s%>;
Beside the <S%H8179>gates<s%>, <S%H3027>at<s%> the <S%H6310>entry<s%> of the <S%H7176>city<s%>, At the <S%H3996>coming<s%> in at the <S%H6607>doors<s%>, she crieth <S%H7442>aloud<s%>:
Unto <S%H376>you<s%>, O men, I <S%H7121>call<s%>; And my <S%H6963>voice<s%> is to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>.
O ye <S%H6612>simple<s%>, <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H6195>prudence<s%>; <S%H3684>And<s%>, ye fools, be of an <S%H995>understanding<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%>, for I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> excellent <S%H5057>things<s%>; And the <S%H4669>opening<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall be right <S%H4339>things<s%>.
For my <S%H2441>mouth<s%> shall <S%H1897>utter<s%> <S%H571>truth<s%>; And <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to my <S%H8193>lips<s%>.
All the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> are in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>; There is nothing <S%H6617>crooked<s%> or perverse in <S%H6141>them<s%>.
They are all <S%H5228>plain<s%> to him that <S%H995>understandeth<s%>, And <S%H3477>right<s%> to them that <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>.
Receive <S%H3947><s%> my <S%H4148>instruction<s%>, and not <S%H3701>silver<s%>; And <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> rather than <S%H977>choice<s%> <S%H2742>gold<s%>.
For <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H6443>rubies<s%>; And all the things that may be <S%H2656>desired<s%> are not to be compared unto <S%H7737>it<s%>.
I <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> have made <S%H6195>prudence<s%> my <S%H7931>dwelling<s%>, And find <S%H4672>out<s%> knowledge and <S%H1847>discretion<s%>.

The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is to <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>: <S%H1344>Pride<s%>, and <S%H1347>arrogancy<s%>, and the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, And the <S%H8419>perverse<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, do I <S%H8130>hate<s%>.
Counsel <S%H6098><s%> is <S%H8454>mine<s%>, and sound knowledge: I am <S%H998>understanding<s%>; I have <S%H1369>might<s%>.
By me <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H4427>reign<s%>, And <S%H7336>princes<s%> <S%H2710>decree<s%> <S%H6664>justice<s%>.
By me <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H8323>rule<s%>, And <S%H5081>nobles<s%>, even all the <S%H8199>judges<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
I <S%H157>love<s%> them that <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H7836>me<s%>; And those that seek me diligently shall find <S%H4672>me<s%>.
Riches <S%H6239><s%> and <S%H3519>honor<s%> are with <S%H6276>me<s%>; Yea, durable <S%H1952>wealth<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.
My <S%H6529>fruit<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H2742>gold<s%>, <S%H6337>yea<s%>, than fine gold; And my <S%H8393>revenue<s%> than <S%H977>choice<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%>.
I <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H734>way<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, In the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5410>paths<s%> of <S%H4941>justice<s%>;
That I may cause those that <S%H157>love<s%> me to <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H3426>substance<s%>, And that I may <S%H4390>fill<s%> their <S%H214>treasuries<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H7069>possessed<s%> me in the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of his <S%H1870>way<s%>, <S%H6924>Before<s%> his works of <S%H4659>old<s%>.
I was set <S%H5258>up<s%> from <S%H5769>everlasting<s%>, from the <S%H7218>beginning<s%>, <S%H6924>Before<s%> the earth <S%H776>was<s%>.
When there were no <S%H8415>depths<s%>, I was brought <S%H2342>forth<s%>, When there were no <S%H4599>fountains<s%> <S%H3513>abounding<s%> with <S%H4325>water<s%>.
Before the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> were <S%H2883>settled<s%>, <S%H6440>Before<s%> the <S%H1389>hills<s%> was I brought <S%H2342>forth<s%>;
While as yet he had not <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, nor the <S%H2351>fields<s%>, Nor the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%>.
When he <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, I was <S%H2710>there<s%>: When he set a <S%H2329>circle<s%> upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep<s%>,
When he made <S%H5810>firm<s%> the <S%H7834>skies<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%>, When the <S%H5869>fountains<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep<s%> became <S%H5810>strong<s%>,

When he <S%H7760>gave<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea<s%> its <S%H2706>bound<s%>, That the <S%H4325>waters<s%> should not <S%H5674>transgress<s%> his <S%H6310>commandment<s%>, When he <S%H2710>marked<s%> out the <S%H4144>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>;
Then I was by <S%H681>him<s%>, as a master <S%H525>workman<s%>; And I was <S%H3117>daily<s%> his <S%H8191>delight<s%>, <S%H7832>Rejoicing<s%> <S%H6256>always<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%>,
Rejoicing <S%H7832><s%> in his <S%H8398>habitable<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%>; And my <S%H8191>delight<s%> was with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>.
Now <S%H1121>therefore<s%>, my sons, <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto <S%H835>me<s%>; For blessed are they that <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H1870>ways<s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%>, and be <S%H2449>wise<s%>, And refuse it <S%H6544>not<s%>.

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> that <S%H8085>heareth<s%> <S%H8245>me<s%>, Watching <S%H3117>daily<s%> at my <S%H1817>gates<s%>, <S%H8104>Waiting<s%> at the <S%H4201>posts<s%> of my <S%H6607>doors<s%>.
For whoso <S%H4672>findeth<s%> me <S%H4672>findeth<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%>, And shall <S%H6329>obtain<s%> <S%H7522>favor<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
But he that <S%H2398>sinneth<s%> against me <S%H2554>wrongeth<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul<s%>: All they that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H4194>death<s%>.
